name: Omerta Game
overview:
Omerta Game is a multi-talented team of designers, technicians and managers who create and manage web projects.

Our original and biggest project is the Mafia-themed web game ‘Omerta’ (www.barafranca.com) - an MOG which has enjoyed over 4.6 million player registrarions.

We publish a game-reviewing webzine Thirteen1 (www.thirteen1.com), which also provides specialised gamer-ese PR services to the Asia-based game dev community, reviews and promotes games and other cool stuff which gamers like.

We created and perfected the UK’s first live bank-to-web payment system Fasterpay (www.fasterpay.co.uk), later sold to a US-based payment provider.

We fully manage our own hosting with a full-time team of expert system administrators and are proficient in the management and security of a variety of Unix and non Unix OS.

We have numerous lesser self-managed web projects and have created web-projects for many third parties.

We develop apps and websites then manage their communities - and we provide consultee to others in similar fields.
